page.shortlink: grid detail images editing properties error style property
page.description: Specify how field validation errors should be displayed.
page.discussion: Validation errors can be displayed next to the field where the error occurs, as a popup when mousing over a field or error icon, or grouped together in a single location. Some styles are not recommended depending on the type of layout used for the controls in the Detail View. Alpha Anywhere will display a warning message when the error style chosen is not recommended. Error messages can be shown using one of the following options:

item.name: block
item.description: Error is shown under the field.

item.name: inline
item.description: Error is shown next to the field.

item.name: tip
item.description: Error is shown in a popup window when the mouse cursor hovers over the field

item.name: icon
item.description: Error is shown in a popup window when the mouse cursor hovers over an error icon.

item.name: global
item.description: All errors are shown in one location, usually as a block of text at the above the Detail View.
